Package com.example.fairdraw.Models

Class User

java.lang.Object
com.example.fairdraw.Models.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class User extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a general application user. This model contains common user attributes such as name, email, phone number, device id, FCM token and assigned roles.

The class is serializable and designed to be persisted in Firestore. Default users are created with the "entrant" role.

See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      No-argument constructor required by Firestore. Initializes the default roles list with the "entrant" role.

    • User

      public User(String name, String email, String phoneNum, String deviceId, String fcmToken)
      Constructs a user with the provided profile fields and initializes default roles.
      Parameters:
      name - user's full name
      email - user's email address
      phoneNum - user's phone number
      deviceId - device identifier for linking role-specific models
      fcmToken - firebase cloud messaging token for push notifications

    • User

      public User(String name, String email, String phoneNum, String deviceId, String fcmToken, Date dateJoined)
      Full constructor including explicit dateJoined. Useful for tests and explicit creation.

      Returns:
      phone number or null if unset

    • getDeviceId

      public String getDeviceId()
      Returns the device id that links role-specific models (e.g. Organizer) to this user.
      Returns:
      device id or null if unset

    • getFcmToken

      public String getFcmToken()
      Returns the FCM token used for push notifications.
      Returns:
      fcm token or null if unset

    • getRoles

      public ArrayList<String> getRoles()
      Returns the list of role names assigned to the user (e.g. "entrant", "organizer").
      Returns:
      list of role strings

    • getDateJoined

      public Date getDateJoined()
      Returns the date the user joined the application. May be null for older users.
      Returns:
      dateJoined or null
